doc:
Steven Hill https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Hill 0 Steven Hill (born Solomon Krakovsky; February 24, 1922 – August 23, 2016) was an American actor. His two better-known roles are district attorney Adam Schiff on the NBC television drama series Law Order, whom he portrayed for 10 seasons (1990–2000), and Dan Briggs, the original team leader of the Impossible Missions Force on the CBS television series Mission: Impossible, whom he portrayed in the initial season of the show (1966–1967). Steven_Hill ( born Solomon_Krakovsky ; February_24_,_1922 – August_23_,_2016 ) was an_American_actor . His_two_better-known_roles are district_attorney_Adam_Schiff on the_NBC_television_drama_series_Law_ , whom he portrayed for 10_seasons ( 1990 – 2000_) , and Dan_Briggs , the_original_team_leader of the_Impossible_Missions_Force on the_CBS_television_series_Mission : Impossible , whom he portrayed in the_initial_season of the_show_(_1966 – 1967_) .
